00001 <h2>Put your Battery under control</h2>
00002 <p class="centered">
00003 <a href="/assets/images/software/macosx/minibatterylogger/minibatterylogger-screenshot-realsize.png" title="Click to see at real size">
00004         <img id="screenshot" style="margin: 10px" src="/assets/images/software/macosx/minibatterylogger/minibatterylogger-screenshot.png" alt="MiniBatteryLogger&rsquo;s main window and session inspector" />
00005 </a>
00006 </p>
00007 <p>
00008         MiniBatteryLogger is a Cocoa application designed to monitor your laptop battery and log all the relevant power events.
00009 </p>
00010 <p id="charts">
00011         The chart view shows the graph of charge and amperage over time, with customizable colors and indicators for
00012         relevant power events. Every change in power properties is logged to file with time and date of occurrence,
00013         and it&rsquo;s listed in the detailed log view.
00014 </p>
00015 <p id="details">
00016         The Battery Inspector tells you all the details about your battery: charge, capacity (actual, maximum and original),
00017         amperage, voltage, cycle count, estimated times to empty and to full charge. It also has a resettable
00018         timer to count the time spent on battery.
00019 </p>
00020 <p id="sharing">
00021         Share your battery data among MiniBatteryLogger users and compare your
00022         battery against the others. MiniBatteryLogger is interfaced to a shared battery data archive that
00023         can also be accessed by a <a href="http://burgos.emeraldion.it/mbl/">Web interface</a>.
00024 </p>
00025 <p id="diagnostics">
00026         A central point to track your battery model, evaluate wear and age, learn estimated remaining life.
00027 </p>
00028 <p id="inspect">
00029         You can save unlimited monitoring sessions to disk for later analysis,
00030         and manage them from the sessions browser. A nice inspector panel lets you retrieve the details of all
00031         the logged events.
00032 </p>
00033 <p id="growl">
00034         The application also notifies you about cord connections and disconnections, begin and end of charge
00035         with <a href="http://growl.info" class="external">Growl</a> notifications.
00036         A customizable threshold lets you be informed when the battery charge decreases under a given amount.
00037 </p>
00038 <p id="ub">
00039         MiniBatteryLogger requires Mac OS X 10.3.9 &ldquo;Panther&rdquo; or later.
00040         MiniBatteryLogger is a Universal Binary application; you can use it under both PowerPC and Intel Macs.
00041 </p>
00042 <p>
00043         Suggestions for improvements, bug reports, comments, postcards are welcome :).
00044 </p>
00045
